rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Wcb Glo Hyd

res.rBody: In toto corde meo alleluia exquisivi te alleluia ne repellas me a mandatis tuis alleluia alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S

verses.vBody: Vide humilitatem meam et eripe me quia legem tuam non sum oblitus
Benedictus es tu domine doce me praecepta tua
In labiis meis pronuntiavi omnia iudicia oris tui

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Wcb Glo Hyd

verses.dox: Gloria patri et filio et spiritui sancto

rep.note: No regressio for this verse in CAO-S
